name: Smash a Head v:1.2
description:
Batle your friends in this 1v1 game. Smash your head and basically that's it.

You can send your own background/car at tihs adress vladionescu59@gmail.com (the car must be for both players i mean one normal and one in the oposite direction)

PS: The game must be played at 1024*768.
